name: Oblivion Mod Archive
summary: Learn about .OMOD files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: OMOD files are used by game community members for creating custom game content. For example, a mod may change the properties of weapons or the appearance of scenery and characters.
NOTE: Both OBMM and NMM require that Oblivion be installed in order to apply mods.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
